content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I received a command to Google the legal implications of using artificial intelligence in the workplace and found various sources including the American Bar Association, Harvard Law School Library, and the United Nations. I then executed Python code to find the sum of natural numbers from 1 to 100 and listed the files in the current directory. Lastly, I read the "legal_research_resources.txt" file and found a list of legal research resources from multiple sources, including Texas State Law Library and Bloomberg Law's Complete Legal Research Resource.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "list_files", "args": {"directory": "."}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command list_files returned: ['atlas.yaml', 'atlas.settings.yaml', 'file_logger.txt', 'atlas.json', 'ai_code.py', 'legal_research_resources.txt', 'average.py', 'test_average.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/neural_network_tests.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/hello_world.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/print_numbers.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/average.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/test_average.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/circle_area.py']", type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "read_file", "args": {"filename": "legal_research_resources.txt"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command read_file returned: Notes on Legal Research Resources:

- Harvard Law School Library guide on free legal research: https://guides.library.harvard.edu/law/free
- Texas State Law Library guide on legal research for beginners: https://guides.sll.texas.gov/legal-research-for-beginners
- George Mason University Law Library list of free legal research resources: https://www.law.gmu.edu/library/freelegalresearch
- Bloomberg Law's Complete Legal Research Resource: https://pro.bloomberglaw.com/the-complete-legal-research-resource/
- Clio's list of best free legal research tools: https://www.clio.com/blog/best-free-legal-research-tools/
- Alaska Court System's legal research page: https://courts.alaska.gov/library/aklegal.htm
- United Nations' legal research guide: https://research.un.org/en/legal
- LexisNexis's list of best free legal research tools: https://www.lexisnexis.com/community/insights/legal/b/thought-leadership/posts/best-free-legal-research-tools", type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "legal implications of using artificial intelligence in the workplace"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_python_code", "args": {"code": "sum = 0\nfor i in range(1, 101):\n    sum += i\nprint(sum)", "basename": "sum_of_naturals"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command execute_python_code returned: 5050
', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "list_files", "args": {"directory": "."}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command list_files returned: ['atlas.yaml', 'atlas.settings.yaml', 'file_logger.txt', 'atlas.json', 'ai_code.py', 'legal_research_resources.txt', 'average.py', 'test_average.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/neural_network_tests.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/hello_world.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/print_numbers.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/average.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/test_average.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/circle_area.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/sum_of_naturals.py']", type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "read_file", "args": {"filename": "legal_research_resources.txt"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command read_file returned: Notes on Legal Research Resources:

- Harvard Law School Library guide on free legal research: https://guides.library.harvard.edu/law/free
- Texas State Law Library guide on legal research for beginners: https://guides.sll.texas.gov/legal-research-for-beginners
- George Mason University Law Library list of free legal research resources: https://www.law.gmu.edu/library/freelegalresearch
- Bloomberg Law's Complete Legal Research Resource: https://pro.bloomberglaw.com/the-complete-legal-research-resource/
- Clio's list of best free legal research tools: https://www.clio.com/blog/best-free-legal-research-tools/
- Alaska Court System's legal research page: https://courts.alaska.gov/library/aklegal.htm
- United Nations' legal research guide: https://research.un.org/en/legal
- LexisNexis's list of best free legal research tools: https://www.lexisnexis.com/community/insights/legal/b/thought-leadership/posts/best-free-legal-research-tools", type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "legal implications of using artificial intelligence in the workplace"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_python_code", "args": {"code": "def factorial(n):\n    if n == 0:\n        return 1\n    else:\n        return n * factorial(n-1)\n\nprint(factorial(5))", "basename": "factorial.py"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command execute_python_code returned: 120
', type='action_result')]
"""
